40.eng-name: The Book Concerning the Use of Correct Words

hadiths.text: This hadith has been reported on the authority of al-A'mash with the same chain of transmitters, and the words are that the servant should not say to his chief:My Lord, and Abu Mu'awiya made an addition:" For it is Allah, the Exalted and Glorious, Who is your Lord

chapter.ara-name: باب حُكْمِ إِطْلاَقِ لَفْظَةِ الْعَبْدِ وَالأَمَةِ وَالْمَوْلَى وَالسَّيِّدِ
chapter.eng-name: Ruling On Using The Words 'Abd And Amah (For Slaves) And Mawla And Sayyid (For Masters)
